author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 26-year-old youth, who was accused in a double murder case, died in a road accident here on Tuesday.

Poovarasan of C.M. Nagar in Karipatti was involved in the murder of Prabhu and Manikandan in 2010. He was arrested and lodged at Salem Central Prison. Recently, he was out on bail.

On Tuesday night, he was on his way to his house from Ayothiapattanam in a two-wheeler. While nearing a market, he tried to overtake a bus and was hit by a lorry coming in the opposite direction. He died on the way to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital. Karipatti police are investigating. On Wednesday, his gang members threatened shopkeepers to close their shops in Ayothiapattanam. The window of a private hospital was also broke. As tension prevailed, police personnel were posted in the area.
title: Murder accused dies in accident
